data.name: Beauty Paradise
data.detailed_description:
Male or Female Edition!

Welcome to Bounce Paradise, The Female edition of this sexy beach story. If however you would rather play from a male perspective then checkout our alternate version 'Bounce Paradise':

https://store.steampowered.com/app/511270/Bounce_Paradise/


About the Game

Welcome to the Blue Ocean Resort, an idyllic paradise on the beach within Paradise Cove.

You find yourself at your grandmother Umi's beach resort. Looking forward to a great summer where they can finally put the past to rest and reconnect with this side of the family.

But there is a catch

When you find that your plans to relax are ruined as your grandmother is ill and she asks if you can help fill in for her whilst she recovers.
Now your time here will be filled with work at this beachside resort instead of play.

Still there is an upside

The resort is filled with a whole host of beautiful female staff to work alongside.

Features

  • Female Protagonist
  • Huge Array of Decisions, each affecting the stories events
  • Multiple different endings to uncover
  • Secrets to unlock and explore
  • Huge variety of locations and characters
  • Large cast of characters and romances

data.short_description: Choose your own story as you take over a beach resort, of course it's not all fun and games but at least the park is filled with an array of beautiful women to distract you. Your choices will determine the story and whether romance is in the air and how your beach visit will end.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes adult scenes and nudity which may not be suitable for all ages and is not safe for work.

All characters in the game are over 18 years old
